title: Selma To Montgomery National Historic Trail: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 1 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Selma To Montgomery National Historic Trail NPS Centennial and Lowndes Interpretive Center Anniversary      Location: Lowndes Interpretive Center Fees: Free     Saturday, August 20, 2016 The Selma to Montgomery National Historic Trail invites you to join us for our NPS Centennial and Lowndes Interpretive Center Anniversary, August 20th 2016 at 12:00 p.m. View Details
